department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
short_summary: One (1) service contract is being issued to complement a pool of resources with experience in conceptualization, development, implementation, improvement, and deployment of MS Dynamics 365 Online and Power Platform in a cloud environment, both domestically and internationally.
duration_in_months: - One (1) contract for   twelve (12) months, with two (2) option period of 12 months.
tags: MS Dynamics 365 Online and Power Platform
